answers.answer: Have they offered the glucose test yet? I know that with gestational diabetes you usually get really big babies like that. They could have also been off with your due date. Did they base it on ultrasound or lmp?
My last menstraul and the ultrasound I had at 19weeks.
This is my 4th pregnany had one 16montha ago was just fine.
I'm measuring 25 w at only 20 w ... I've only gained 10 lbs my entire pregnancy so I have no idea why I am :/
I measure 6 weeks too big so they did the glucose test which came back normal so they did an ultrasound, I'm carrying extra fluid and the baby is a little big, that's why I'm measuring big

question: I'm 24weeks today and I am meausing at 30weeks? I've also gained 30 pounds this is pretty excessive. Can any moms relate to what I am going through and what it could be?
title: meausing big
